proverbs.title: Nin wax cunay xishood. A man who has eaten something becomes shy. "Society had a crime problem. It hired cops to attack
proverbs.content: Nin wax cunay xishood. A man who has eaten something becomes shy. "Society had a crime problem. It hired cops to attack crime. Now society has a cop problem."

metadata.content: Nin wax cunay xishood. A man who has eaten something becomes shy. "Society had a crime problem. It hired cops to attack crime. Now society has a cop problem."

music.title: Baye Fall Chant unplugged
music.content: This is a recording of Baye Fall chanting recorded in Diourbel, Senegal on July 22, 2011. The Baye Falls are a sub-sect of the Mouride Islamic Brotherhood. This was recorded outside the compound of a Peace Corps Volunteer serving in Senegal.

metadata.title: Baye Fall Chant unplugged
metadata.content: This is a recording of Baye Fall chanting recorded in Diourbel, Senegal on July 22, 2011. The Baye Falls are a sub-sect of the Mouride Islamic Brotherhood. This was recorded outside the compound of a Peace Corps Volunteer serving in Senegal.

music.title: 24 Topographie sonore du quartier : chant du petit cossyphe
music.content: Recording of the atmosphere in the Nkolmbong-Nord neighborhood, Émana, Yaoundé 1, Cameroon. November 5, 2024, 6:14 a.m. Sounds captured: song of a Snowy-crowned Robin-Chat amid human activity. This bird is normally quite rare in urban areas . Equipment: iPhone 7. Average quality.

metadata.title: 24 Topographie sonore du quartier : chant du petit cossyphe
metadata.content: Recording of the atmosphere in the Nkolmbong-Nord neighborhood, Émana, Yaoundé 1, Cameroon. November 5, 2024, 6:14 a.m. Sounds captured: song of a Snowy-crowned Robin-Chat amid human activity. This bird is normally quite rare in urban areas . Equipment: iPhone 7. Average quality.
